description: Returns a list of tags that are applied to the specified Amazon Web Services X-Ray group or sampling rule.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of an X-Ray group or sampling rule.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags, as key and value pairs, that is associated with the specified X-Ray group or sampling rule.
Maximum number of user-applied tags per resource: 50
Tag keys and values are case sensitive.
Don't use aws: as a prefix for keys; it's reserved for Amazon Web Services use. You cannot edit or delete system tags.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token. If multiple pages of results are returned, use the NextToken value returned with the current page of results to get the next page of results.
